t: MyPillow Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of mypillow.com
s: February 28, 2025 - I decided to treat myself and purge most of my old towels and buy more from MyPillow. The colors are terrific and exactly what I expected. However, they seemed so much thinner. After laundering them, I put a set of my old ones side by side with a set of the brand new ones and there is a clear difference. The pile is definitely shorter and they are thinner. This is truly disappointing because they didn't meet my expectations based on my previous experience. ... I bought a pillow ...
